title: Science, seedbed of industry
creator_credit: Grant Crabtree, Mel Thistle, Pied Piper Films and ONF | NFB
brief_description: A presentation of discoveries made by scientists at Canada’s National Research Council, Ottawa, that have become patented and manufactured. The film describes the origins of some of the inventions, invites scientists to explain and looks in on factories where various items are mass-produced.
